content.raw:
> the sdf parameter look like the plugin needs to be in the parent model

I guess my thinking is that the parent model is whichever model that has the plugin. I don't really see a reason why the vehicle should be the parent and the child be the breadcrumb. The opposite should be fine too. At least, that's what I would want as a user of the system.

> if we set self_collide = true in the bread-crumb models, does that fix it?

No, that didn't work. I tried putting it in all of the models and that still didn't work.
content.html:
the sdf parameter look like the plugin needs to be in the parent model

I guess my thinking is that the parent model is whichever model that has the plugin. I don't really see a reason why the vehicle should be the parent and the child be the breadcrumb. The opposite should be fine too. At least, that's what I would want as a user of the system.

if we set self_collide = true in the bread-crumb models, does that fix it?

No, that didn't work. I tried putting it in all of the models and that still didn't work.
